name: [Twine] Choose Your Own Fruitventure
description: The protagonist awakes as a fruit of unknown species who gathers clues about themself through self-love and by re-learning the use of their senses. The intent is to get the player from feeling helpless to being in control of the fate of another. Making immoral choices in the latter half of the game, though, results in karmic retribution. Links loop back on themselves, lead to more detailed descriptions, contain secrets about yourself, and some paths include guesswork. Those paths are meant to induce uncertainty. Enjoy!
